verses.verse: We <S%G1161>then<s%> that are <S%G1415>strong<s%> <S%G3784>ought<s%> to <S%G941>bear<s%> the <S%G771>infirmities<s%> of the <S%G102>weak,<s%> and not to <S%G700>please<s%> <S%G1438>ourselves.<s%>
Let <S%G1538>every<s%> one of us <S%G700>please<s%> his <S%G4139>neighbor<s%> for his <S%G18>good<s%> to <S%G3619>edification.<s%>

For <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G700>pleased<s%> not <S%G1438>himself;<s%> but, as it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> The <S%G3679>reproaches<s%> of them that <S%G3679>reproached<s%> you <S%G1968>fell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> me.

For <S%G3745>whatever<s%> things were <S%G4270>written<s%> <S%G4270>aforetime<s%> were <S%G4270>written<s%> for our <S%G1319>learning,<s%> that we <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G5281>patience<s%> and <S%G3874>comfort<s%> of the <S%G1124>scriptures<s%> might <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1680>hope.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G5281>patience<s%> and <S%G3874>consolation<s%> <S%G1325>grant<s%> you to be like <S%G3588>minded<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G1722>toward<s%> <S%G240>another<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus:<s%>

That you may with <S%G3661>one<s%> <S%G3661>mind<s%> and <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%> <S%G1392>glorify<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>
<S%G1352>Why<s%> <S%G4355>receive<s%> you <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another,<s%> as <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4355>received<s%> us to the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G1063>Now<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> was a <S%G1249>minister<s%> of the <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> for the <S%G225>truth<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> to <S%G950>confirm<s%> the <S%G1860>promises<s%> made to the <S%G3962>fathers:<s%>

And that the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> might <S%G1392>glorify<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> for his <S%G1656>mercy;<s%> as it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> For <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G1223>cause<s%> I will <S%G1843>confess<s%> to you <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> and <S%G5567>sing<s%> to your <S%G3686>name.<s%>
And <S%G3825>again<s%> he <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2165>Rejoice,<s%> you <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> with his <S%G2992>people.<s%>
And <S%G3825>again,<s%> <S%G134>Praise<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> you <S%G1484>Gentiles;<s%> and <S%G1867>laud<s%> him, <S%G3956>all<s%> you <S%G2992>people.<s%>

And <S%G3825>again,<s%> <S%G2268>Esaias<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> There shall be a <S%G4491>root<s%> of <S%G2421>Jesse,<s%> and he that shall <S%G450>rise<s%> to <S%G757>reign<s%> over the <S%G1484>Gentiles;<s%> in him shall the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G1679>trust.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G1680>hope<s%> <S%G4137>fill<s%> you with <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%> and <S%G1515>peace<s%> in <S%G4100>believing,<s%> that you may <S%G4052>abound<s%> in <S%G1680>hope,<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> of the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost.<s%>

And I myself <S%G2532>also<s%> am <S%G3982>persuaded<s%> of you, my <S%G80>brothers,<s%> that you <S%G2532>also<s%> are <S%G3324>full<s%> of <S%G19>goodness,<s%> <S%G4137>filled<s%> with <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1108>knowledge,<s%> <S%G1410>able<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> to <S%G3560>admonish<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another.<s%>

<S%G1161>Nevertheless,<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1125>written<s%> the <S%G5112>more<s%> <S%G5112>boldly<s%> to you in <S%G575>some<s%> <S%G3313><s%> <S%G3313>sort,<s%> as <S%G1878>putting<s%> you in <S%G1878>mind,<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G5485>grace<s%> that is <S%G1325>given<s%> to me of <S%G2316>God,<s%>

That I should be the <S%G3011>minister<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> to the <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> <S%G2418>ministering<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> that the <S%G4376>offering<s%> up of the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> might be <S%G2144>acceptable,<s%> being <S%G37>sanctified<s%> by the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost.<s%>
I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> whereof I may <S%G2746>glory<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> in <S%G3588>those<s%> things which pertain to <S%G2316>God.<s%>

For I will not <S%G5111>dare<s%> to <S%G2980>speak<s%> of <S%G5100>any<s%> of those things <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> has not <S%G2716>worked<s%> by me, to <S%G1519>make<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G5218>obedient,<s%> by <S%G3056>word<s%> and <S%G2041>deed,<s%>

<S%G1722>Through<s%> <S%G1411>mighty<s%> <S%G4592>signs<s%> and <S%G5059>wonders,<s%> by the <S%G1411>power<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%> <S%G5620>so<s%> that from <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%G2943>round<s%> <S%G2945>about<s%> to <S%G2437>Illyricum,<s%> I have <S%G4137>fully<s%> <S%G4137>preached<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

<S%G235>Yes,<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> have I <S%G5389>strived<s%> to <S%G2097>preach<s%> the <S%G2097>gospel,<s%> not <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> was <S%G3687>named,<s%> <S%G2443>lest<s%> <S%G3361><s%> I should <S%G3618>build<s%> on <S%G245>another<s%> <S%G245>man's<s%> <S%G2310>foundation:<s%>
But as it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> To <S%G3739>whom<s%> he was not <S%G312>spoken<s%> of, they shall <S%G3700>see:<s%> and they that have not <S%G191>heard<s%> shall <S%G4920>understand.<s%>
For <S%G1352>which<s%> <S%G1352>cause<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> I have been <S%G5248>much<s%> <S%G1465>hindered<s%> from <S%G2064>coming<s%> to you.

But <S%G3570>now<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3371>no<s%> <S%G2001>more<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> in <S%G5125>these<s%> <S%G2824>parts,<s%> and <S%G2192>having<s%> a <S%G1974>great<s%> <S%G1974>desire<s%> these <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> to you;

<S%G5613>Whenever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> I take my <S%G4198>journey<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G4681>Spain,<s%> I will <S%G2064>come<s%> to you: for I <S%G1679>trust<s%> to <S%G2300>see<s%> you in my <S%G1279>journey,<s%> and to be <S%G4311>brought<s%> on my <S%G4311>way<s%> <S%G1563>thitherward<s%> by you, <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%> I be <S%G1705>somewhat<s%> <S%G1705>filled<s%> with <S%G5216>your<s%> company.
But <S%G3570>now<s%> I <S%G4198>go<s%> to <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%G1247>minister<s%> to the <S%G40>saints.<s%>

For it has <S%G2106>pleased<s%> them of <S%G3109>Macedonia<s%> and <S%G882>Achaia<s%> to <S%G4160>make<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G2842>contribution<s%> for the <S%G4434>poor<s%> <S%G40>saints<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem.<s%>

It has <S%G2106>pleased<s%> them <S%G1063>truly;<s%> and their <S%G3781>debtors<s%> they are. For <S%G1487>if<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> have been <S%G2841>made<s%> <S%G2841>partakers<s%> of their <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> things, their <S%G3784>duty<s%> is <S%G2532>also<s%> to <S%G3008>minister<s%> to them in <S%G4559>carnal<s%> things.

When <S%G3767>therefore<s%> I have <S%G2005>performed<s%> <S%G5124>this,<s%> and have <S%G4972>sealed<s%> to them <S%G5126>this<s%> <S%G2590>fruit,<s%> I will <S%G565>come<s%> by you <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G4681>Spain.<s%>

And I am <S%G1492>sure<s%> that, when I <S%G2064>come<s%> to you, I shall <S%G2064>come<s%> in the <S%G4138>fullness<s%> of the <S%G2129>blessing<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> I <S%G3870>beseech<s%> you, <S%G80>brothers,<s%> for the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ's<s%> sake, and for the <S%G26>love<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> that you <S%G4865>strive<s%> <S%G4865>together<s%> with me in <S%G3588>your<s%> <S%G4335>prayers<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> for me;

That I may be <S%G4506>delivered<s%> from them that do not <S%G544>believe<s%> in <S%G2449>Judaea;<s%> and that my <S%G1248>service<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> I have for <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%> may be <S%G2144>accepted<s%> of the <S%G40>saints;<s%>
That I may <S%G2064>come<s%> to you with <S%G5479>joy<s%> by the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and may with you be <S%G4875>refreshed.<s%>
<S%G1161>Now<s%> the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G1515>peace<s%> be with you <S%G3956>all.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>
